org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector

Class SingleElementVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector.AbstractVector
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.math.impls.vector.SingleElementVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, Destroyable, MetaAttributes, StorageOpsMetrics, Vector

    public class SingleElementVector
extends AbstractVector
    Read-write vector holding a single non-zero value at some index.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
